name: Bump
description: Bump provides a way to invisibly manipulate tokens on the GM Layer from the Objects Layer, and vice versa. For instructions, run `!bump --help`. Forum Discussion: https://app.roll20.net/forum/permalink/10226949/## API InterfaceTo require `Bump` for your script, add `"Bump"` to the `"dependencies"` property of your `script.json`:```json"dependencies": ["Bump"]```## Function Reference### `Bump.Bump(ids)`Toggle the layer for each token represented by the ids in the array `ids`.Tokens not already slaved in Bump will be ignored.  The array is not checkedfor duplicates.### `Bump.Slave(ids,push=false)`Adds each token represented by the ids in the array `ids` to Bump.  If `push`is true, tokens on the objects layer will be pushed to the GM layer whenslaved.### `Bump.Unslave(ids)`Removes each token represented by the ids in the array `ids` from Bump.
